info.description: Individual advantage card highlighting city benefits (e.g., Strategic Position, Growth, etc.)

advantage_title.description: Main title of the advantage (e.g., 'Strategic Market Position', 'Explosive Growth Demographics')

advantage_main_description.description: Primary description text explaining this advantage

advantage_detailed_info.description: Additional detailed information shown on hover (e.g., 'Connect with 15+ emerging markets within 3-hour radius')

advantage_icon.description: Icon image for this advantage (PNG/SVG recommended)

icon_alt_text.description: Alternative text for the icon for accessibility

advantage_category_tag.description: Category tag displayed on the advantage card

display_order.description: Order in which this advantage should appear (1, 2, 3, etc.)
